r.d: Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer was born as a porting of the Spreadsheet::WriteExcel Perl module to PHP. It allows writing of Excel spreadsheets without the need for COM objects. It supports formulas, images (BMP) and all kinds of formatting for text and cells. It currently supports the BIFF5 format (Excel 5.0), so functionality appeared in the latest Excel versions is not yet available.
r.n: New features: -added support for row ranges (JT Hughes) -added method Format::setUnLocked() (Ajit Dixit) -added Worksheet::writeRow() and Worksheet::writeCol() Bug fixes: -fixed problem with unparenthesized expresions in formulas (Brent Laminack) -fixed problems with non ISO-8859-1 characters (KUBO Atsuhiro) -fixed swapping of columns in formulas (JT Hughes) -fixed assorted bugs in tokenizing formulas (JT Hughes) -fixed Worksheet::activate() (JT Hughes)
